summary: Don't like the Skyrim 1H and 2H weapon swing sounds? Here is the solution!
descriptionHtml:
[center]Better Weapon Swing for Skyrim © 2012 Crystan

-> Nexus exclusive mod <-[/center]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]

Never liked the Skyrim weapon swing sounds? They're not "powerfull" enough? Annoyed by sheet metal sound?

Here is the solution - this Mod replaces the weapon swing sounds with completly self made ones (recorded and edited). Yup, that means they're unique and i put a lot of work in them.

I hope you like them!

Note:
Check the credits and distribution permission page for corresponding informations.

[center]
Checkout my other Mods for Skyrim:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31039/?][img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/31039-1-1360089051.png[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22648][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/22648-2-1368962752.jpg[/img][/url]
Improved Horse Step Sounds | Dagger Sounds 4 Daggers[/center]

[center]
--------------------------------------

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact me under CrystanSeaAge@gmx.de


Support me by checking out my free game "Super Arkatis"!
(a shmup inspired by Tyrian and Raptor)

[/size][size=1]

[url=http://www.indiedb.com/games/ufo-alien-invasion]UFO: Alien Invasion[/url][/center]
